msItem.title: Divan of Hafiz.
msItem.note: F1a, stamp the name and date filled in in ink: Presented to the ROYAL ASIATIC SOCIETY by Lieutenant Colonel C.J. Doyle 15 of March 1834 Ruled margins and dividing panels. Illuminated initial opening.

listBibl.bibl: Entered in the Donations Register for 15 March 1834. No 16 in list of Persian MSS.

layoutDesc.p: 12 lines to the page in double column

handNote.persName: Shamsa b, Khwajh Muhammad b. Khwajah Taj al-Din Kashmiri

bindingDesc.p: Black leather binding with painted decoration.

origin.p: Mughal India. Safar A.H. 1046 (July-August 1636), in the reign of Jahangir.

acquisition.p: Presented by Lieutenant Colonel C.J. Doyle.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
